title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: CHEF!!!!!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Huh? Oh... Sorry, children... Let's run some plays.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: The kids head for the field.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Ah, Mr. Chef, sir?

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: No, Pip we still don't have a helmet for you.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Right-o... But how about I'll use a helmet today, and one of the other children goes without.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: That wouldn't be very fair to the other children now would it.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Um, no... I guess not.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: A small wooden building with a sign that reads 'Carl's' and
text: under that 'Bombs, Explosives, and Accessories'.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Jimbo and Ned are sitting at a small table looking at a small
text: bomb.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: What we want to do, Carl, is put a trigger on that bomb that makes it go off at a specific moment during halftime.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: And what moment would that be?

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Well, John Stomos' older brother is all set to sing 'Loving You' during halftime. We want that bomb to go off when he hits that high F.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: What high F?

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: You know --

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Loving you, is easy 'cause you're beautiful... Doot'n Doot'n Doo Doo AAAAHHH!!!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: So you want it to trigger on the Doot'n Doo?

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: No damnit the AAAHHHH!!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: (Hitting wrong note) Aaahhhh?

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Ahhhhhh

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: AHHHHHH!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Ahhhhh

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Doot'n doot'n doo doo. Ahhh

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Doot'n doot'n doo doo.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: You got it.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Doot'n doot'n doo doo. Ahhhhh, Uh yea okay.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Practice is over. The boys are taking off their uniforms.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: What's the matter, Stan? You seem down.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: I just can't concentrate, 'cause my dog is gay.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Well, you know what they say; you can't teach a gay dog straight tricks.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Oh, stop filling his head with that queer loving propaganda.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Say what? You of all people should be sympathetic.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: What do you mean?

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Well you're gay aren't you?

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: WHAT?! WHAT THE HELL ARE YOU TALKING ABOUT?! I am not gay!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Well you sure do act like it.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: I just act that way to get chicks, dumbass.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: What's the matter, dude?

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: I don't know where Sparky is. He usually follows me to football practice.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Maybe he went shopping for some leather pants.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Stan slugs Cartman in the head.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: OW!!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: All alone in a vast blizzard, Sparky trudges on. He walks
text: slowly and sadly.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: He turns his head one way, and then another, uncertain where
text: to go.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Finally, he spots a large structure and walks towards it.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: The sign slowly becomes visible. It reads "Big Gay Al's".

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Sparky walks up to large wooden doors, from where a large
text: gay man emerges.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Hello there, little pup. I'm Big Gay Al.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Have you been outcast?

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Well then I'm so glad you found my big gay animal sanctuary. We're all big gay friends here. Would you like to live with us?

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Come on in, little fellow. Nobody will ever oppress you here...

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Sparky Follows Big Gay Al into the large wooden doors.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Stan walks up to the other boys.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Have you guys seen Sparky? He still hasn't come back.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Wow, it's been like two days.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: I think he might have run away.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Did you check the shopping mall?

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Stan slugs Cartman in the head.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: OW!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Well, we'll help you look for him after the game.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: I'm not playing.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: You what?

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: I'm not playing in that stupid game. I have to find my dog.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Middle Park is a much nicer, larger school.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Jimbo and Ned quietly tiptoe around the exterior of the
text: school. Ned is carrying the bomb.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Come on, Ned, and keep quiet.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Okay.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: They walk up to a little fenced-in horse. A sign above it
text: reads 'Middle Park Cowboys Mascot - "Enrique"'.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Hello there, Enrique.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: What are we doing here?

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Well, Ned, we always kidnap middle park's mascot... But THIS year we're gonna booby trap it instead!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Jimbo attaches the bomb to the horse.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: And when John Stamos older brother hits that high F in 'Loving You' BOOM!! No more middle park players!!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Jimbo and Ned laugh. The horse looks extremely worried.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: God damn I love football!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Stan walks along looking for Sparky.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Sparky! Where are you??!!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Where could he be?!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Now a large crowd has gathered at the football field. The
text: Middle Park Cowboys, looking sharp in silver and blue uniforms warm up for the game by doing stretches.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Hello everyone, this is Frank Hammond at South Park public radio AM 900, welcome to tonight's match up between the Middle Park Cowboys and the South Park Cows. Well, looks like Chef, the South Park Cows' coach is a little nervous... This is probably because his star quarterback has yet to show up.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: (nervously checking his watch) Come on, Stan...

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Uh, Mr. Chef, if Stanley doesn't show up, can I use his helmet?

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: No, Pip, I'm sorry.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Stan looks tired and beaten as he walks through the frozen
text: tundra of South Park.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Sparky?! SPAAAARKY?!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: PLAY BALL!!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: You're gonna have to quaterback, Kyle.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: But I never practiced quarterback.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Well it's a little late for that bullcrap now.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: The ref blows his whistle and the kids head for the field.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Filling in for quarterback is number 12, Kyle Broslofski.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: The townspeople all MOAN and GASP.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Hey, hey, where's little Stanly?

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Yeah, why the hell is that little Jewish kid playing quarterback?!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Jimbo and Ned look at each other worriedly.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Ned! Look!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Jimbo points to the Middle Park sidelines, where Enrique is
text: just barely visible in a little cage. Strapped around Enrique's torso, is the large, obvious bomb.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: They've got Enrique on their sidelines! And it looks like that bomb is still attached!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Yea!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: EXT. BIG GAY AL'S BIG GAY ANIMAL SANCTUARY

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Stan walks up upon the HUGE compound on the outskirts of
text: town. A large man with a pencil mustache comes out of the front gate.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Hi, little fella, how are you doing today?

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Fine, how are you?

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: I'm super, thanks for asking!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: My gay dog ran away and I was wondering if maybe he came here.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Well... Let's see. Come on in!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Big Gay Al whisks Stan inside the compound.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: EXT. BIG GAY AL'S BIG GAY ANIMAL SANCTUARY

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: A huge outdoor compound with swimming pools and volleyball
text: sandpits and every animal imaginable.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Do you have lots of gay dogs here?

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: We have all sorts of gay animals here at Big Gay Al's. Over here we have a gay lion --

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: A big GAY LION lounges in the corner.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Roar.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: And we have gay water buffalo, gay hummingbirds -- here's a gaggle of gay gooses.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: A bunch of gooses walk by wing in wing and blow a kiss to
text: Al.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Hi fellas, it's so super to see you!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Wow, it seems like the animals here are really happy.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Of course they are silly buns! It's the one place where gay animals can really be themselves. Do you like to dance?

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Big Gay Al hits a switch on the wall and raging TECHNO music
text: kicks in. All the animals start to gyrate.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: The South Park team is in a huddle.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Cartman you hike me the ball. Then somebody run and I'll throw it or something. Ready...

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: BREAK!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: The kids step up to the line of scrimmage and look over the
text: ominous Middle Park players.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: You guys are toast.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Yeah! We're gonna pound your heads in!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: We'll just see about that!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Kyle gets behind Cartman, Cartman gets ready to hike the
text: ball.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Set... Set...

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: DAMMIT CARTMAN!!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: (Shouting) What's the matter?!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Cartman farted!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: No I didn't! That was just my shoes.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Come on, Kyle, we'll get a delay of game penalty!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: No way, dude!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: HIKE THE BALL!!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Oh, dude, weak.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Kyle lifts his jersey up over his nose and gets back behind
text: Cartman.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: That's right you get back there now.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: HIKE!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: The ball is snapped... Middle Park Blitzes!!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: The Middle Park kids charge Kyle and pound the shit out of
text: him.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: FUMBLE!! Middle Park gets the ball... They run it in for a TOUCHDOWN!! The score is seven -- nothing Middle Park with 14:57 remaining in the first quarter.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: In the stands, Ned and Jimbo look at each other with concern.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Hell's bells.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: I haven't seen a beating like that since Rodney King.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Sportscaster Phil quickly covers the microphone.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Now Frank, that's not very P.C. you're gonna get in trouble again!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Right, right, I gotta watch that...

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: If we lose our money 'cause of your nephew, we're gonna hang you up to dry, Jimbo!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Don't ya'll worry... You just wait 'til halftime!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: INT. BIG GAY AL'S BIG GAY ANIMAL SANCTUARY

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: The animals continue to dance. Stan dances techno with them,
text: when suddenly he spots something.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: SPARKY!!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Bark.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Sparky walks over with his pink bandana, happy to see Stan.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Hiya Sparky, how's it going?

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Bark.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: I missed you, old pal, you really had me scared.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Bark.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Come on, let's go home, I can still make it in time for the game.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Sparky starts to follow Stan out.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: We can work on making you not gay together.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Sparky stops in his tracks. Stan turns back around, puzzled.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Sparky?

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Just then, Big Gay Al walks up behind Stan.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Young man it appears you still don't understand.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: What don't I understand?

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Come this way, I have to show you something.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: With just over a minute to go in the half, the score is Middle Park Cowboys 52, South Park cows 0.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Kyle again hikes the ball, he hands off to Pip, whose head
text: is a bloody, dirty mass. Pip charges the line of scrimmage and is immediately pummeled.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: One of the Cowboys scoops up the ball and runs it in for a
text: touchdown.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: I haven't seen an Englishman take a blow like that since Hugh Grant.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: (Covering the mic) Dude! Now that is NOT COOL!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Sorry, sorry.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Stan follows Big Gay Al through a large Corridor.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Okay Stan, I think you should get in line for my big gay boat ride.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Big Gay Al points to a Disneyland-esque ride with 'Big Gay
text: Al's Big Gay Boat Adventure' sign above it.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Little wooden boats travel along a man-made canal, similar
text: to the Jungle Cruise.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: About four people are standing in line.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Step aboard, Stanly.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Stan and Big Gay Al get on one of the little boats, which
text: heads down the canal. Big Gay Al picks up a microphone at the front of the boat.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Hello everyone, and welcome aboard the big gay boat ride. On this adventure, we'll be seeing the world of gayness throughout time.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: The Cowboys kick off the ball to the Cows.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: And the South Park Cows are set to receive... There's the kick... It's taken by number 23, Kenny McKormik.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Kenny grabs the ball and runs down the field. He actually
text: manages to dodge some tacklers!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: He runs faster and faster! He just might make a good play!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: He's at the 50! The 40! The 30!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Suddenly, two Middle Park players tackle Kenny, violently
text: ripping off one of his arms. Kenny starts bleeding profusely, then gets his head ripped off by another Cowboy player.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: The little running back is DOWN! I think he's... Yes he's been decapitated!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: OH MY GOD! THEY'VE KILLED KENNY! YOU BASTARDS!!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: That's gotta hurt, Frank!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Ouch-a-roo!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Hey, come on, that was roughing!! ...At least let us scrape him off the field!!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Looks like the South Park Cows aren't even going to beat the 72 point spread, not by a long shot.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: You see, Gayness has existed since the beginning of time...

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: The boat passes little animatronic cave men. Two of the cave
text: men are holding hands.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: From the Egyptian Pharaohs...

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: The boat passes two gay Egyptian men.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: To the Shoguns of Japan...

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Two Shoguns in a techno dance club.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Oh, oh! Look out! It's the oppressors! Christians and Republicans and Nazis OH MY!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Three lame animatronics dressed respectively as a Christian,
text: a Republican and a Nazi, beat an innocent homosexual with a pipe.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Just like the jungle cruise, Big gay Al takes out a fake
text: pistol and fires blanks at the animatronics.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Hoo! Oh gosh That was close! Okay let's steer our big gay boat out of here, and into a place where gays are allowed to live freely...

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: The boat passes through to large doors, which open into a
text: HUGE, colorful, festive room where tons of animatronics dance and sing merrily.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: We're all gay and it's okay! 'Cause gay means happy and happy means gay! We're not sad anymore 'cause we're out the closet door! It's OKAY to be GAY!!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Stan looks around in disbelief. All the gay things dance,
text: sing and do silly things.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: It's okay to be Gay! it's okay to be Gay! La La La La La...

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: So what do you think, Stan?

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: This kicks ass!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: I'm sorry I tried to change you, Spark. I just didn't understand.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Sparky barks and pants happily. Stan pets him on the head.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Isn't this precious?

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: And now here to sing the touching song 'Loving You' is the one and only... John Stamos' brother!!!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: The crowd let's out a small smattering of applause. Music
text: begins.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Jimbo and Ned give each other knowing glances and then look
text: over at the Middle Park sidelines.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Enrique is absolutely horrified, waiting to explode in the
text: midst of the Middle Park players.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Patrick Stamos steps up to the mic and starts to sing.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Loving you... Is easy 'cause you're beautiful...

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: ANGLE - JIMBO AND NED ANGLE - ENRIQUE RESUME - FOOTBALL FIELD

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Do du doot'n da doo...

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: And then the big note is about to come...

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: (Low register) Ahhha.....Ahhhh.......Ahhhhh.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: What the hell?! He didn't sing the high F!!!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Richard Stamos can't sing a high F. He always screws it up like this.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Jimbo and Ned look absolutely defeated.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Ned... We're gonna get our asses kicked.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Loving you...

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: (heckling) It's obvious where all the talent in THAT family went!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Doot'n doot'n doo doo...

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: EXT. BIG GAY AL'S BIG GAY ANIMAL SANCTUARY

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Stan, Sparky and Big Gay Al stand outside the Animal
text: Sanctuary.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Thanks for everything Big Gay Al!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Bark!!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: No problem kids! Are you sure you don't wanna stay for some toasted cheese sandwiches?

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: No thanks, I've gota get back for the big football game. Come on boy!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Oh Stan --

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: When you get back to town... Tell them about us, will you? Tell them there are gay animals here who need homes desperately.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: I will Big Gay Al, I will.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Stan waves goodbye and runs off. Big Gay Al watches Stan go
text: fondly, and then suddenly panics.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Ooh, my carrot cake!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: The little football clad kids crash violently into each other.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: And these South Park cows are being absolutely MOLESTED by Middle Park. I haven't seen so many children molested since --

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: In the stands, the townspeople are just sitting there, bored
text: and disheartened.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: I thought you said beating the spread was a sure thing, Jimbo!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Yeah, we all put our lives' savings in this game!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: You're a DEAD MAN, Jimbo!!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Jimbo shrinks in his seat as all the townspeople start YELLING
text: at him and throwing their food at him.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Well, this should just about wrap it up for -- Wait a minute, what's this?

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Suddenly, Stan and Sparky come running over the hill. The
text: townspeople all CHEER!!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: It's Stan, the South Park star quarterback!!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Where the hell of you been, Stan?

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: I've been getting my best friend back.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Just get in there, boy!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Chef throws a helmet on Stan's head and pats his ass toward
text: the playing field.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Give 'em hell, Stanly!!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Stan walks up to the line of scrimmage.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: (Praying) Jesus... Now I haven't asked you for much... But all we need is one little score. PLEASE? PLEASE Jesus??

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Pull back to reveal that Jesus is sitting next to him in the
text: stands.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Leave me alone.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: HIKE!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Stan hikes the ball... He steps back to pass!!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Hey Stan! I'm open I think!!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: And he throws it to Kyle, the little Jewish kid!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Kyle catches the ball and runs down the field.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Oh my! I haven't seen a Jew run like that since Poland, 1938!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: DUDE!!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Kyle runs into the end zone and falls down.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: TOUCHDOWN!!!!!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: The clock runs out! And the Final score is Middle Park Cowboys 73, South Park cows six! South Park beats the spread.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Everybody cheers and hugs. The South Park Cows all converge
text: on Stan and rejoice.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Stan is heroically hoisted onto a small stage, where everybody
text: is gathered around.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Speech!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Sportscaster Frank steps up and shoves a microphone in front
text: of Stan.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Stan, what do you want to tell the world about this stunning almost victory?

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Uh... It... It's really cool that we beat the spread against the Cowboys.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: And... And maybe we can beat 'em even more next year!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: And it's okay to be gay!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: The townspeople all get incredibly quiet.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: What?!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Being gay is just a part of nature, and a beautiful thing!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: What the hell is he talking about?!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Uh... Stanly you arrived very late in the game, where were you that whole time?

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: I was with my new friend Big Gay Al. He showed me his Big Gay Animal Sanctuary and took me on a Big Gay Boat ride where I learned all about the wonders of gayety.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: The townspeople all look at each other and blink.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: It's true, I'll show you.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: EXT. BIG GAY AL'S BIG GAY ANIMAL SANCTUARY

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Nestled between the two mountain peaks are... Nothing. No
text: Big Gay Al's... Nothing.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: But it was here... It was all right here. There was a techno dance club...

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Stan, you need to lay off the cough syrup, alright, seriously I'm worried about you man.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: OLIVER!!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: A townsperson runs over to where all the gay animals are
text: standing and picks up a cat.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: I thought you ran away all those months ago!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Now other townspeople walk toward the gay animals and start
text: to reunite.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: SIDNEY!!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: WHINNY!!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: CARLOS!!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: The townspeople all rejoice with their gay animals, leaving
text: Stan all alone.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: I want to thank you for bringing everybody here.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Big Gay Al is standing there with a small suitcase, which he
text: sets on the ground and opens.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Oh, there you are, dude. How's it going?

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: I'm super, thanks for asking. It looks like now my work here is done.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Big Gay Al steps into his suit case, and presses a large
text: blue button.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Goodbye, Stanly, peace be with you.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: The suitcase closes with Big Gay Al inside, then powers up
text: and shoots up into the sky to outer-space.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Wow...

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Stan watches as the little suitcase ship becomes just another
text: twinkling star.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: YOU GUYS, YOU GUYS!! I CAN DO IT!!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Do what?

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: (Singing) Loving you... Is easy 'cause you're beautiful. Doot'n Doot'n...

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
role: Enrique looks absolutely horrified. Jimbo and Ned look even
text: more horrified.

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: NO!!!

title: BIG GAY AL S BIG GAY BOATRIDE
text: Doo Doo! AABOOOOMMM!!
